title: Inaccurate CRM data leading to slower GTM execution - Clientell
meta_description: Inaccurate CRM data hinders GTM strategy execution, slowing efforts to reach the target audience, promote products, and drive revenue.
content: Manage Your Salesforce Data In Minutes With Easy PromptsTry for FREE NowInaccurate CRM data leading to slower GTM executionIs AI Out of Control The Hidden Risks of Salesforces New AgentForceSalesSalesforceGeneralSaahil DhakaDec 20 20224 minsInaccurate customer relationship management CRM data can have a significant impact on a companys ability to effectively execute its go-to-market GTM strategy GTM is a critical component of any businesss success as it determines how a company will reach its target audience promote its products and services and ultimately drive revenue When CRM data is inaccurate it can lead to slower GTM execution and ultimately hinder a companys ability to achieve its business objectivesWhy is CRM data crucialCRM data is used to track and manage customer interactions sales and marketing activities It is a central repository for customer information including contact details communication history and sales data This data is crucial for understanding customer behavior and preferences as well as for targeting marketing campaigns and identifying potential sales opportunitiesWhat inaccurate data can doWhen CRM data is inaccurate it can lead to a number of problems Like- If a companys CRM database contains incorrect contact information for its customers it may be unable to reach them through email or other communication channels This can result in missed opportunities for engagement and salesInaccurate CRM data can also lead to poor targeting of marketing campaigns If a companys CRM database contains outdated or incomplete information about its customers it may be unable to accurately segment its audience and create tailored marketing messages This can result in marketing efforts that are less effective and may even alienate potential customersFurthermore it can hinder a companys ability to effectively track and measure the success of its GTM strategy If a companys CRM database contains errors or inconsistencies it may be difficult to accurately track the performance of marketing campaigns and sales campaigns This can make it difficult to identify areas for improvement and optimize the GTM processCRM Data and sales tech stack67 of sales teams use between 4 and 10 digital selling tools as part of their sales tech stacks But 42 of sales teams fail to see a clear ROI on these tools Inaccurate CRM data is a major reason for your sales tech stack failure here창s howLack of accurate data-driven insightsRep창s work hours wasted in data verificationData silos after juggling with multiple toolsMisalignment of marketing and salesOverall inaccurate CRM data can significantly slow down a companys GTM execution and hinder its ability to achieve its business objectives To avoid these problems it is important for companies to regularly review and update their CRM data to ensure its accuracy and completeness This can help ensure that the data is reliable and can be used effectively to support GTM activitiesHow to deal with itInaccurate CRM data can be caused by a number of different factors For example it can occur when data is entered manually and mistakes are made It can also occur when data is imported from external sources and is not properly formatted or validated Additionally CRM data can become inaccurate over time as customers information changes such as their contact details or preferencesTo avoid the negative effects of inaccurate CRM data companies can take a number of steps to ensure the accuracy and completeness of their data For example - Implementing strict data entry protocols and using data validation tools to prevent errors when data is entered manually - Investing in data integration and cleansing solutions to ensure that data from external sources is accurately imported and properly formatted - And implementing processes for regularly reviewing and updating their CRM data to ensure that it remains accurate and up-to-dateAll these steps may or may not work depending on the sales processes of the organization plus they again put a toll on the sales reps which again is not a good sign for the company A better solution can be something which can make the data filling process easier as automating the whole process will not make sense due to low scraping accuracy Some factors you should always check in these tools- Actually solves the problem- Easy to integrate- Easy to useTo know more about the tool which can actually make a difference in rep창s data filling experience and save 4 hours every week of each rep You must see Clientell창s
